data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in North Sikkim, Sikkim, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of North Sikkim, Sikkim, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of North Sikkim you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in North Sikkim, Sikkim, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, convict the 481 believers in North Sikkim to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of North Sikkim, Sikkim, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mangan
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mangan, Sikkim, India.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in North Sikkim, Sikkim, India.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in North Sikkim, Sikkim, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the county of North Sikkim, Sikkim, India has a population of 43,700.

We estimate North Sikkim has 481 people who might know Jesus, 530 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 42,689 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of North Sikkim.
